2309.html:

Visitor Email : didier.andres@rescuola.eu

Visitor Msg : Hello, I have a problem, I can't modify my customed fields anymore .... What do I have to do to solve the problem ? Thanks a lot. Best Regards. Didier

2310.html:
Visitor Name : Didier ANDRES,
Visitor Email : didier.andres@rescuola.eu

Visitor Msg : Hello, WC fields factory doesn't function anymore.... We need your help .... The interface to build a custom field is not reactiv anymore.... I put the name of the field - Change the nature of the field but there no change ..... And the "per default text form" stay activ with no change - The same with the conditional rules ..... If you could help us to find a solution ? It would be nice.... The upload files doesn't work (also not) ..... Thanks a lot.... Best Regards. Didier ANDRES

2311.html:
Visitor Name : Glynn,
Visitor Email : admin@thestuffilove.com

Visitor Msg : Hello. Could you please tell me how to delete all the old WC Fields Files. I think these files may be interfering with the Wholesale price plugin. Just deleting WC fields has left field text boxes in the products pages. Regards Glynn.

2313.html:
Visitor Name : Sven M. Schröder,
Visitor Email : sms@bwogruppe.de

Visitor Msg : ATTENTION: Your form does not validate the emailaddress properly! Please reply to sms@bwo-gruppe.de - Thank you Hello, can you give me a rough estimate for a woocommerce plugin?! I need a product bundle consisting of two items, where I can specify multiple variable products for each of the components. So it's like a product variation but with products instead of attributes. Also, it must be possible to specify an individual price for each variation. Instead of adding multiple products it would be nice if I could add a category and a product or two categories. Basically, it is a product bundle based on two products, however the customer should be able to choose. An example product Bundle could look like this: Item one is a single product which must be combined with a second product from a specific category. Please let me know if you understand what I mean. If this is something you are interested in, how much will it roughly cost? Kind Regards, SMS

2329.html:
Visitor Name : Alessandro,
Visitor Email : cingerla@netscape.net

Visitor Msg : Hi. My name is Alessandro. I've got a customer who is a car spare parts manufacturer. He asked me to build a website for him. I suggested a wordpress/woocommerce website: you can see a test online studiocingerla.it/demo There are several customization to do but I would like to begin for the most important. Users are searching their spare parts by car > car model > car type/year > ... I've already set this creating 2 kinds of products: 1st - cars which are bundled products (now woocommerce Product Bundles plugin BUT I'd like to change it with yours); 2nd - spare parts which are simple products. I need to link several product (simple) to one type of car, categorize cars, while the search for products will work oh attributes. Now I've got 2 issues: A) - display the product bundled as shown in the images dropbox https://www.dropbox.com/s/3uwurnxujdqgl20/now.png?dl=0 https://www.dropbox.com/s/s4gbnncda0dl0uu/expected.png?dl=0 B) - bulk link simple products to grouped products I would like to begin with A). Could you please check it and quote it? Thanks. If you want to check the availability of the point B) and quote it as well, you're welcome. Thanks. Regards A.

2332.html:
Visitor Name : Ethan,
Visitor Email : ethan@rxmix.co

Visitor Msg : I'm wondering about the API you mention for WC Product Bundles. Where can I find the API documentation? I want to create a product builder where a user can create a complex product bundle in a form and then it results in a new product being added to the whole woocommerce store. Is there a way to create a new product bundle from the API? Or is it only for modifying the layout, etc.
